data.oai_dc:dc: Five well documented collections: R. Scholz's, W. Kolbe's and G. Polentz's total colls of beetles from Silesia (over 400 000 specimens), J. Pluciński's coll. of world Cerambycidae and Attelabidae, and P. Stachowiak's collection of European (mainly Polish) Curculionoidea.|17,114 occurrences
